statements: SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyTechniques ORDER BY technique_name ASC;
SELECT technique_id, technique_name, technique_description FROM MusicTherapyTechniques WHERE therapeutic_goal = 'Relaxation' LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT therapeutic_goal FROM MusicTherapyTechniques;
SELECT technique_name, recommended_duration FROM MusicTherapyTechniques WHERE recommended_duration >= '1 hour';
SELECT technique_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(exercises) AS num_exercises FROM MusicTherapyTechniques ORDER BY num_exercises DESC;
SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyTechniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, therapeutic_goal FROM MusicTherapyTechniques WHERE recommended_duration > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT technique_id, technique_name, technique_description FROM MusicTherapyTechniques WHERE technique_name ILIKE '%binaural%';
SELECT technique_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(exercises) AS total_exercises FROM MusicTherapyTechniques WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(exercises) > 5;
SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyTechniques ORDER BY recommended_duration DESC, technique_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_techniques;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description FROM music_therapy_techniques;
SELECT technique_id, technique_name from music_therapy_techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM therapy_exercises WHERE technique_id = 2;
SELECT exercise_name, exercise_description FROM therapy_exercises WHERE exercise_name LIKE 'Relaxation%';
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, technique_description FROM music_therapy_techniques WHERE technique_name LIKE '%relaxation%';
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_techniques WHERE technique_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT technique_name, exercise_name FROM music_therapy_techniques JOIN therapy_exercises ON music_therapy_techniques.technique_id = therapy_exercises.technique_id;

SELECT technique_name, COUNT(exercise_id) AS total_exercises FROM music_therapy_techniques LEFT JOIN therapy_exercises ON music_therapy_techniques.technique_id = therapy_exercises.technique_id GROUP BY technique_name HAVING COUNT(exercise_id) > 0;
SELECT * FROM Therapy_Techniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM Therapy_Techniques WHERE technique_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Therapy_Exercises WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM Therapy_Exercises ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, category FROM Therapy_Activities WHERE category = 'Physical Therapy' ORDER BY activity_name;
SELECT * FROM Therapy_Techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM Therapy_Techniques WHERE technique_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT exercise_name, duration FROM Therapy_Exercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT activity_name, category FROM Therapy_Activities WHERE category = 'Flexibility' AND activity_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Therapy_Techniques WHERE description LIKE '%physical%' ORDER BY technique_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Techniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM Techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT exercise_name, duration_minutes FROM Exercises ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT activity_name, type, created_at FROM Activities WHERE type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM Treatments WHERE technique_id = 2 AND activity_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT exercise_name, duration_minutes FROM Exercises WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY exercise_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, technique_name FROM Treatments JOIN Techniques ON Treatments.technique_id = Techniques.technique_id;
SELECT activity_name, description FROM Activities WHERE type = 'Indoor' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT technique_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM Treatments GROUP BY technique_id HAVING total_activities > 2;
SELECT * FROM Techniques;
SELECT name, description FROM Techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT duration_minutes, name FROM Exercises ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Activities WHERE type = 'Cardio';
SELECT plan_id, patient_id, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Techniques;
SELECT name, description FROM Techniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, therapist_id, start_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE therapist_id = 100 AND patient_id = 200;
SELECT activity_id, name, duration_minutes FROM Activities WHERE type = 'Cardio' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT session_id, date_time, notes FROM Sessions WHERE plan_id = 50 ORDER BY date_time ASC;
